name: Frogue (IanTheBee, Hydro Dev, B-Bud, WarxTron, pieroqg1)
name_original: Frogue (IanTheBee, Hydro Dev, B-Bud, WarxTron, pieroqg1)
description: You play as a Frog who has had a horrifying nightmare of a horrific beast. You wake up, and after some adventuring, learn that it was real. You need to prepare to go into the dark realm, and kill him once and for all.
